posts.title: rest_api_template 接口文档模板
posts.text: 接口名 接口描述 URL /a/rest/ Method: PUT URL Params Required: id=[String] ID Data Params Required: desc=[String] 描述 Success Response: Code: 200 Content: 12345{"success": true,"msg": "提交成功!","timestamp": 1464318030110} Error Response: Error: 房源不存在 Content: 123456{ "success": false, "msg": "房源不存在!", "err_code": "", "timestamp": 1464318083587} OR Error: 价格不能为空 Content: 123456{ "success": false, "msg": "价格不能为空!", "err_code": "", "timestamp": 1464318083587}
